cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Basic 3 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Back to basics rooms ideal for singles travelling together.  Single sized bed + bunk bed, linen & towels included.  Room features heating, a small window, small wardrobe, Free Wi-Fi.  Shared bathrooms, communal kitchen, laundry and TV/Games lounge.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Rooms  feature a Queen sized bed, an ensuite bathroom with shower, includes linen & towels.  Room features heating, small window, a wardrobe, Wi-Fi, mini fridge, kettle with tea & coffee making facilities. Communal kitchen, laundry & TV/Games lounge.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Views to Mount Ruapehu. Featuring Queen bed, + single bed.  Extra single bed available for small children.   Ensuite bathroom, outdoor deck, Wi-Fi, Heating, Wardrobe, Desk, Digital TV, Mini fridge, Kettle, bathroom amenities including a hairdryer.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Views to Tongariro National Park. Featuring King sized bed, Ensuite bathroom with shower, outdoor deck, free Wi-Fi, Heating, Wardrobe, Desk, Digital TV, Mini fridge, kettle, tea & coffee making facilities, bathroom amenities including a hairdryer.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Ideal for 2 adults & 2 children. Located on lower ground floor. Queen bed + single bunk.  Bathroom with shower over the bath.  Furnished balcony leads to communal outdoor deck.  Free Wi-Fi, Wardrobe, Desk, Digital TV, Heating, mini fridge, Kettle.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 30th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 30th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
